content: I'm wondering what the rationale is for not having languagesOffered (or "communication) as a field is in HealthcareService and PractitionerRole? It is a very common field in all types of directories.
Feel free to submit a change request
@J Olivier can support with this one submitted https://gforge.hl7.org/gf/project/fhir/tracker/?action=TrackerItemEdit&tracker_item_id=15722

Ok great, I had already submitted, and so now there's a duplicate in the system https://gforge.hl7.org/gf/project/fhir/tracker/?action=TrackerItemEdit&tracker_item_id=17379

I'll migrate my comment that i submitted into yours.
